reviews.review: One of the best shooters I've ever played, even compared to today's standards, definitely a must for any PC gamer.
Bestes Spiel, dass jemals gemacht wurde.

When it came out it was a redefining moment in the genre, and after replaying it several times I can safely say that it remains as one of my favourite FPS games.

A definite recommendation for anyone who hasn't played it yet, and despite its age it still looks great and even better, runs on pretty much everything.

9 ½ / 10

Jogo muito intrigante, com gráfico foda pra época e bonitos até hoje, enrredo emocionante (e confuso no final), jogabilidade boa , personagens marcantes, esse é uma obra entre outras da Valve que não são de se ignorar, pois conseguem se destacar, acabam chamando atenção e é ai que você entende o porque de tantos elogios à Valve, sem dúvidas, uma ótima opção para gastar seu dinheiro

This is what happens when a perfect combination of narrative, level design, gameplay and interactivity meet. Not to mention the (at the time) mind blowing graphics. This is, in my opinion, the pinnacle of all of Valve's work and truly one of the greatest games I've played as of yet. It simply does everything right- the story keeps you immersed and the characters are all memorable, with dialogue and cinematics being one of the most interesting parts of the game, other than being just a break from combat (which happens all too often nowadays). The gunplay feels just right, and every weapon in your ever-increasing arsenal is great in its own way- different situations will call for different weapons. The gravity gun deserves mentioning though, as it is just pure awesome and allows you to truly use your environment to your advantage (hurling explosive barrels, slicing through enemies with sawlades, throwing enemy grenades back, etc.). There are also no cutscenes- every single event takes place through the eyes of Mr. Freeman, which is an approach that Valve absolutely nailed. As I mentioned before, the game continuously encourages environment interaction, and not just with the gravity gun. The clever puzzles throughout the game are an example of this. The enemy variety and artificial intelligence is also incredible. All in all, an amazing game. And, as a side note, WE WANT A SEQUEL ALREADY!!!!

This game claimed respectable places in loads of toplists, so i tried it. Finished it in 10 hours. Don't get me wrong, i know how important this game is, how revolutionary it is, and how many games it influenced. Just check out the HL2 mods coming out right now. The engine of this game is still not out of date. 
I guess i should've played it when it came out. I would've been stunned. But today, it's just a simple action-FPS. It's flawless, really, but the story just doesn't get you hooked. With all the extra features FPS games offer you nowadays... HL2 is probably boring for younger generations. 
This game deserves all the respect you can have for a game, but i see no point in trying it today. Why do i recommend it then? The importance of this game should be enough reason to thank the creators of the game with a few bucks.

I'm playing the games through again for the fifth time and I still marvel at how good the game looks even now, how interesting and mysterious the story is, how fun it is to run, think, shoot, live.

The games are fascinating, they've got this unique, valvey feel of mystery and intelligence, the physics are still top of the line to today's standards, the gameplay is as fun as it is now as it was years ago. The pacing is a feat like no other game. Fast paced action in an area, running around, dodging, taking cover, shooting, finding ammo, switching around weapons and traversing the area followed by long sequences of interesting puzzle solving and plot, it's a golden formula unmatched by literally every other shooter I've played. Half-life 2, and the first, and the episodes- they are, and always will be, my favorite games ever.

Ce jeu à un peu vieilli et si cela vous empèche de l'apprécier, sachez qu'il existe des mods qui améliorent un peu l'aspect visuel sans trop détériorer l'expérience (oubliez le cinematic truc mod).

Concretement, c'est un FPS old school qui serait probablement considéré un peu arcade aujourd'hui à cause des déplacements rapides et vivaces qu'il est possible d'effectuer sans parler du nombre d'armes qu'il est possible de porter à tout moment. Pourtant, c'est de loin celui qui, encore aujourd'hui, vous donne une impression de liberté de mouvement jamais égalé. Les nouveaux joueurs pourront prendre leur temps pour assimiler le gameplay et les anciens se jeteront dedans tête la première et parcoureront les niveaux avec une aisance familière, presque abusive par rapport aux standarts des FPS d'aujourd'hui.

Ce jeu vous mets dans la peau d'un homme de sciences devenu légende suite aux évènements du premier jeu. On y parcourt les niveaux au level design travaillé et aux situations et personnages mémorables avec des phases de shoot ainsi que des moments calmes propices à l'exploration et à la résolution de puzzles simplistes mais originaux.
La particularité de ce jeu passe d'ailleurs par son moteur physique atypique puisque basé sur une version modifié du Havok pourtant très utilisé ailleurs. Mais ici, c'est différent sur un aspect bien particulier. principalement le simple fait qu'il soit possible d'empiler des objets les uns sur les autres et de pouvoir interragir avec qans que ça soit le bordel... Oui, ça semble ridicule mais pourtant, très peu de jeux à ma conaissance permetent une telle chose sans causer de gros soucis.

Bref, ce jeu est une bouffée de fraicheur dans le monde du FPS que je recomande à tout le monde d'essayer. En plus il est régulièrement à 2€ bordel... Prenez en plusieurs et offrez les de force.

Najlepsza gra od czasów Half Life 1 (z 1998 roku), po dziś dzień jedna z moim ulubionych produkcji...Fabuła gry jest dość zawiła i wielu graczy jak i recenzentów na nią narzekało, lecz dla mnie jest spójna i dość ciekawa. Na początku widzimy twarz znanego z pierwszej części gry G-mana, który opowiada nam pewną historię.  ocana gry 10/10
